WRITING.TITLE: Using only players you get from packs
WRITING.TEXT: UPDATED TEAM: And after opening packs, heres the current team Im using with some synergies (Wish I had better left defenders): https://hutdb.net/18/builder/1015301 Because of market crash and ability to get good players too easily and cheap, I came up with this idea to make HUT more exciting for myself again. Selling my whole team and start using only players I get from packs so no more using of auction house. After selling my team, Im going to have about 1,3-1,4 million coins so I understand It's still going to be "easy" to get good team cause of better "good player" packing changes this year, but the synergy stuff will be more complicated to build of course. Well... Lets see how long I can keep going this way lol. Going to post the complete team after current team sold and packs opened. What you guys think about this? Some best pulls: Base gold cards: Karlsson, Doughty, Stamkos, Benn, Malkin, Ovechkin, Burns, Holtby, Bobrovsky, Keith, Weber, Backstrom, Tarasenko, Getzlaf, Marchand, Scheifele etc. Ice: Ovechkin, Laine, Radulov, Monahan, Eichel, Stone, Hoffman, Bailey, Hellebuyck, Gostisbehere, Oshie, Werenski, Smith, Ehlers, Neil, Boeser, Trocheck Andersen, Shattenkirk, Muzzin, Rielly, Rantanen, Zuccarello, Barrie, Perron, Dadonov, Mantha, Turris, Brown Prime time/Milestone/Helpers: Gibson, Sharp, Both Sedins TOTW: Kopitar, Jamie Benn, Wheeler, Doughty, Yandle, Jenner, Hart (BTOTW) Evolution: MacKinnon, Josi, Drouin Links for pack pulls: (https://www.reddit.com/r/NHLHUT/comments/7jn1gz/only_using_players_from_packs_collector_pack_with/) https://www.reddit.com/r/NHLHUT/comments/7k22zq/anders_lee_looks_little_bit_like_vampire_but_i/
Wishing you good luck with it!
Thanks for the information. Gonna check those videos :)
Good idea, but now its my only change to get Evo MacKinnon so probs doing it now ;)

WRITING.TITLE: What do you guys think about my all untradeable team, which I'm actually using at the moment?

WRITING.TEXT: Some story about the build #8230; Players I built from already untradeable ones: - Icons: Sel #228;nne, Gartner - Flashbacks: Panarin (from his 92 TOTW card I got from rivals rewards), Crosby (I got his TOTD from rivals rewards) - TOTS: Josi (from winternational Master Set Josi I re-rolled) - Champions: Necas (Ofc from fantasy Necas) Players I built from tradeable ones: - TOTY Burns (I bought TOTY nominee Hamilton thinking he could get TOTY card and later built him into Burns) Re-Rolls: - Borowiecki - Brisebois Rival Rewards: - Tkachuk - Aho - Palmieri - Robert - Smid - Letang Players from event packs, which granted you one player from current event: - Hossa - Arnott - Miller - Marleau Winternational collectible sets: - Rinne
